title: Carlos Alcaraz defeats Lorenzo Musetti to win Monte Carlo Masters
summary1: Carlos Alcaraz wins his first Monte Carlo Masters title with victory over Lorenzo Musetti . The 21-year-old Spaniard defeats the Italian in three sets 3-6, 6-1 6-0 . It is a sixth Masters title for the Spaniard, a four-time Grand Slam winner, and his most prestigious title since winning Wimbledon last year . Musetti had already taken down two Top 10 players, Stefanos Tsitsipas and Alex de Minaur, on his way to the final .
summary2: Carlos Alcaraz wins his first Monte Carlo Masters title with victory over Lorenzo Musetti . The 21-year-old Spaniard defeats the Italian in three sets 3-6, 6-1 6-0 . It is a sixth Masters title for the Spaniard, a four-time Grand Slam winner, and his most prestigious title since winning Wimbledon last year . Musetti had already taken down two Top 10 players, Stefanos Tsitsipas and Alex de Minaur, on his way to his first Masters 1000 final . He will move up a place in the rankings and displace Alexander Zverev at No 2 in the race for the No 3 spot in the top 10 spot . The Italian hopes Musetti will return to the top of the rankings with a rise to No 11 in the next rankings after his victory . He said he is disappointed he couldn't finish the match in the best way for the crowd at the tournament in his first match in 2022, saying: "You deserve it

title: Ghei regrets not playing Masters after first Augusta National trip
summary1: Gaurav Ghei is the first Indian golfer to qualify for a major championship . The 56-year-old made the front pages in India in 1995 when he won the Gadgil Western Masters in dramatic fashion with a chip-in eagle . Ghei was asked by a friend if he wanted to come to Augusta and watch the action in Thursday’s first round . He was taken aback by the sheer scale of the place and the challenge it poses to the golfers . The Delhi Golf Club legend also appreciated how well Augusta National took care of the fans .
summary2: Gaurav Ghei is the first Indian golfer to qualify for a major championship . The 56-year-old made the front pages in India in 1995 when he won the Gadgil Western Masters in dramatic fashion with a chip-in eagle . Ghei was asked by a friend if he wanted to come to Augusta and watch the action in Thursday’s first round . He was taken aback by the sheer scale of the place, its efficiency, and the challenge it poses to the golfers . The Delhi Golf Club legend also appreciated how well Augusta National took care of the fans . He hopes Rory McIlroy and Bryson DeChambeau will be an amazing champion at the Masters on Sunday . The world No.1 Scottie Scheffler are the two best players in the world and are the most popular among the fans, Ghei said. “Any of them winning would be great. I just hope they play like they did in the third round”

title: Maharashtra board exams 2025: Minister Nitesh Rane seeks ban on burqa
summary1: Maharashtra minister and BJP leader Nitesh Rane on Wednesday sought a ban on wearing burqa during the next month's Std 10th and 12th examinations of the state board . He said allowing girl candidates to wear a burqa inside examination halls could lead to malpractices and also create security issues . If necessary, female police officers or female staff should be appointed to conduct checks, he said . The school education ministry was yet to respond to his demand . Maharashtra Secondary School Certificate exam for Class 10 will be held from February 21 .
summary2: Maharashtra minister and BJP leader Nitesh Rane on Wednesday sought a ban on wearing burqa during the next month's Std 10th and 12th examinations of the state board . He said allowing girl candidates to wear a burqa inside examination halls could lead to malpractices and also create security issues . If necessary, female police officers or female staff should be appointed to conduct checks, he said . The school education ministry was yet to respond to his demand, officials said . Maharashtra Secondary School Certificate exam for Class 10 will be held from February 21 . The Higher Secondary Certificate Exam for Class 12 will start from February 11. Maharashtra Secondary . title: Telangana govt will develop 'Future City' as role model for country: CM Revanth Reddy
summary1: Telangana Chief Minister A Revanth Reddy said his government would develop the proposed "Future City" as a role model for the country . Reddy added that the state government plans to undertake the Musi River rejuvenation, Future City, and the Regional Ring Road as part of its vision to make the state a model model . The project will span 765 sq km, covering 56 villages across seven mandals, strategically located between the Srisailam and Nagarjunasagar highways on the outskirts of Hyderabad .
summary2: Telangana Chief Minister A Revanth Reddy said his government would develop the proposed "Future City" as a role model for the country . Reddy added that the state government plans to undertake the Musi River rejuvenation, Future City, and the Regional Ring Road as part of its vision to make the state a model for India . The project will span 765 sq km, covering 56 villages across seven mandals, strategically located between the Srisailam and Nagarjunasagar highways on the outskirts of Hyderabad . Governor Jishnu Dev Varma said Future City is envisioned as India's first "net-zero city", designed to be both "sustainable and economically vibrant" Reddy also stated that the government has decided to take strict action against "anti-social elements and troublemakers" The state government would maintain cordial relations with the Centre, constitutional institutions such as the Governor’s office, and other authorities . title: Are stock markets open on Monday, April 14? Details here
summary1: The stock market in India will remain closed tomorrow, April 14, on account of Ambedkar Jayanti . No trading activity will occur on the BSE or NSE on Monday . The market will resume on April 15, April 15 and April 18, on the occasion of Good Friday . The Indian stock market is scheduled to observe a total of 14 holidays in 2025 . Meanwhile, theIndian stock market has faced increased instability lately due to global recession concerns . These concerns have been triggered by former U.S. President Donald Trump’s tariff measures .
summary2: The stock market in India will remain closed tomorrow, April 14, on account of Ambedkar Jayanti . No trading activity will occur on the BSE or NSE on Monday . The market will resume on April 15, April 15 and April 18, on the occasion of Good Friday . The Indian stock market is scheduled to observe a total of 14 holidays in 2025 . Meanwhile, theIndian stock market has faced increased instability lately due to global recession concerns . The Sensex and Nifty 50 ended the day lower, even as the Reserve Bank of India’s Monetary Policy Committee announced a 25-bond cut in the repo rate and a change in its policy stance . The markets have also seen increased instability due to former U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff measures, which have been triggered by U.N. President Barack Obama's tariffs on the U.K. State Department's decision to impose new restrictions on some of the world's biggest oil and gas prices in recent days .

title: Sanaya Nair shares emotional throwback after Karun Nair's stunning IPL comeback
summary1: Karun Nair made a dream return to the Indian Premier League (IPL) on April 13, smashing 89 off just 40 deliveries for Delhi Capitals against Mumbai Indians . This explosive innings marked Nair’s first IPL fifty in seven years, his previous one coming in 2018 while playing for Kings XI Punjab . His wife, Sanaya Tankariwala Nair, took to Instagram to share the heartwarming journey of her husband's IPL career . She posted a throwback photo from 2017, when Nair played for Delhi Daredevils .
summary2: Karun Nair made a dream return to the Indian Premier League (IPL) on April 13, smashing 89 off just 40 deliveries for Delhi Capitals against Mumbai Indians . This explosive innings marked Nair’s first IPL fifty in seven years, his previous one coming in 2018 while playing for Kings XI Punjab . His wife, Sanaya Tankariwala Nair, took to Instagram to share the heartwarming journey of her husband's IPL career . She posted a throwback photo from 2017, when Nair played for Delhi Daredevils, showing the couple smiling together . Alongside it, she shared a current-day picture from 2025, featuring the couple with their two children, all proudly donning the Delhi Capitals jersey . Nair has been in prolific touch recently, particularly during the Vijay Hazare Trophy, where he amassed an astonishing 779 runs in nine matches, including five centuries and a fifty, averaging a jaw-dropping 389.50.50 .

title: "Still a very good wicket": Cummins reacts as LSG defeat SRH by five wickets
summary1: Lucknow Super Giants beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by five wickets in their IPL clash . LSG chased down Sunriser Hyderabad's total of 190 in their run-chase . Nicholas Pooran and Mitchell Marsh scored half-centuries for LSG . Shardul Thakur was named the 'Player of the Match' for his fiery spell . Captain Pat Cummins praised LSG's bowlers for their well-planned approach to chase down SRH's total . With this win, LSG strengthened their position in the tournament .
summary2: Lucknow Super Giants beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by five wickets in their IPL clash . LSG chased down Sunriser Hyderabad's total of 190 in their run-chase . Nicholas Pooran and Mitchell Marsh scored half-centuries for LSG . Shardul Thakur was named the 'Player of the Match' for his fiery spell . Captain Pat Cummins praised LSG's bowlers for their well-planned approach to chase down SRH's total . With this win, LSG strengthened their position in the IPL while SRH will look to bounce back in their upcoming matches as IPL season progresses to the next two weeks of the season . title: How Ambedkar’s amendment led to the creation of the Election Commission
summary1: Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar is considered the key architect of the Indian Constitution . He is credited with the creation of the Election Commission, an independent body mandated to hold elections to the office of President and Vice President, and Lok Sabha, state assembly, Rajya Sabha and state legislative council polls . The EC came into being on January 25, 1950, a day before India became a Republic . Draft Article 289 proposed separate election commissions for the Centre and the states, scholarly articles and Constituent Assembly debates suggest .
summary2: Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar is considered the key architect of the Indian Constitution . He is credited with the creation of the Election Commission, an independent body mandated to hold elections to the office of President and Vice President, and Lok Sabha, state assembly, Rajya Sabha and state legislative council polls . The EC came into being on January 25, 1950, a day before India became a Republic . Draft Article 289 proposed separate election commissions for the Centre and the states . It also proposed separate commissions for each state or province . The new Article 324 proposed by him made the poll machinery centralised by having a singular poll authority for holding state and national elections . It gives the EC "plenary powers" to conduct elections and prepare electoral rolls. The Supreme Court has on various occasions upheld these powers. Article 324 is a vast reservoir of powers for the poll panel. The EC has been upheld by the Supreme Court to conduct and prepare elections and preparation of electoral rolls for state and union territories .

title: Govt launches helpdesk to help businesses navigate US tariff issues
summary1: The directorate general of foreign trade (DGFT) has launched a dedicated ‘Global Tariff and Trade Helpdesk’ to help exporters navigate trade issues because of the US’ reciprocal tariffs . The commerce department and DGFT are tracking developments in global trade, particularly in relation to tariff changes, import surges, and export-related challenges . The help desk would also collect and collate trade-related issues concerning other ministries and departments of both central government and states .
summary2: The directorate general of foreign trade (DGFT) has launched a dedicated ‘Global Tariff and Trade Helpdesk’ to help exporters navigate trade issues because of the US’ reciprocal tariffs . The commerce department and DGFT are tracking developments in global trade, particularly in relation to tariff changes, import surges, and export-related challenges . The help desk would also collect and collate trade-related issues concerning other ministries and departments of both central government and states, and will co-ordinate to seek their support and provide possible resolutions . It said the export-import community could raise the issues on which support is required using helpdesk service, email to dgftedi@nic.in or call the Toll-Free No at 1800-111-550. The status of resolutions and feedback may be tracked using the status tracker under the DGFT helpdesK services, it added. The Status of resolutions may be monitored using the Status Tracker under the helpdes

title: Are banks open on April 14, Ambedkar Jayanti 2025? Full bank holiday list
summary1: D BR Ambedkar Jayanti is a national holiday held on April 14 every year to commemorate the birth anniversary of the chief architect of the Indian Constitution . Banks will be closed in Gujarat, Mizoram, Maharashtra, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, West Bengal, New Delhi, Chhattisgarh, and Jharkhand . It is among the several other bank holidays scheduled in April 2025, including Good Friday, Bohag Bihu, Basava Jayanti and Akshaya Tritiya .
summary2: D BR Ambedkar Jayanti is a national holiday held on April 14 every year to commemorate the birth anniversary of the chief architect of the Indian Constitution . This means that banks will be closed in Gujarat, Mizoram, Maharashtra, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, West Bengal, New Delhi, Chhattisgarh, and Jharkhand . It is among the several other bank holidays scheduled in April 2025, including Good Friday, Bohag Bihu, Basava Jayanti, and Akshaya Tritiya . Customers can still access digital or net banking services throughout the year, unless the bank notifies otherwise (Usually for maintenance work) It is, however, best advised to contact your nearest bank branch in case there are any further confusions regarding bank holidays . You can even start a fixed deposit or a recurring deposit on such days digitally on these days digitally and to use your bank website, banking apps, UPI and ATM services

title: Nakamura knocks Arjun out in Freestyle quarterfinals
summary1: Arjun Erigaisi loses to Hikaru Nakamura in Freestyle Chess Grand Slam Tour quarterfinal . No Indian player will be in contention for the $200,000 top prize in Paris leg of the Paris leg . Fabiano Caruana, Magnus Carlsen, Vincent Keymer and Ian Nepomniachtchi all progress to the semi-finals of the freestyle chess tournament . The second game of the 9-12th place encounters ended in draws, which was all Praggnanandhaa R and Richard Rapport needed to win their respective matches .

Earlier on Thursday evening, Caruana was the first player among the pool of quarterfinalists to find a place in the semi finals with a win over Frenchman Maxime Vachier-Lagrave . title: Groom gets rejected over CIBIL score: Woman’s family cancels marriage
summary1: Man from Maharashtra was rejected just before finalising the wedding after one of his prospective bride's uncles insisted on checking his CIBIL score . The woman’s family was shocked that the prospective groom had multiple loans in his name and from different banks . A low score indicates a poor credit history. It usually indicates irregular payments, load default, and financial instability . The other members of the woman's family also agreed and withdrew the wedding proposal . The incident took place in Maharastra's Murtizapur .
summary2: Man from Maharashtra was rejected just before finalising the wedding after one of his prospective bride's uncles insisted on checking his CIBIL score . The woman’s family was shocked that the prospective groom had multiple loans in his name and from different banks . A low score indicates a poor credit history. It usually indicates irregular payments, load default, and financial instability . The other members of the woman's family also agreed and withdrew the wedding proposal . The incident took place in Maharastra's Murtizapur, Maharashtra, according to the Times of India (TOI) The woman's uncle argued that the man, already burdened with financial difficulties, won't be a suitable match for his niece as he won’t be able to provide financial security to his future wife . A CIBIL Score is a three-digit number that summarises a person's credit history and ranges from 300 to 900. While a higher number indicates a good financial life, a lower score signifies the opposite .

title: Telangana tunnel accident: Search ops to be over in 15 days, says Minister Srinivas Reddy
summary1: Telangana Revenue Minister P Srinivas Reddy on Wednesday said the ongoing search operations at SLBC tunnel are expected to be completed in 15 days . Eight individuals were trapped in the Srisailam Left Bank Canal project tunnel when a portion of it collapsed on February 22 . Reddy said about 700-800 experts from various institutions have worked day and night under the supervision of the authorities for the 40 days . The services of cadaver dogs from Kerala are being used to find out the traces of those trapped .
summary2: Telangana Revenue Minister P Srinivas Reddy on Wednesday said the ongoing search operations at SLBC tunnel are expected to be completed in 15 days . Eight individuals were trapped in the Srisailam Left Bank Canal project tunnel when a portion of it collapsed on February 22 . Reddy said about 700-800 experts from various institutions have worked day and night under the supervision of the authorities for the 40 days and currently, around 550-560 people are continuing the search operations . So far, two bodies have been recovered from the debris in the tunnel . The services of cadaver dogs from Kerala are being used to find out the traces of those trapped in tunnel accident . The minister said all necessary steps would be taken to prevent any losses during tunnel excavation in the future . The state government has made arrangements so that those involved in relief operations do not face any problems. The state has made an arrangement so that these involved in the relief operations are not facing any problems, he further said .

title: Chhattisgarh: Injuries to troops in anti-Naxal ops jump 4 times in 2025
summary1: The number of security personnel injured in IED attacks in Chhattisgarh has jumped to around 300 per cent in the first quarter of 2025 . As summer peaks in the jungles of the "last Naxal bastion" of the state, the security agencies are "treading with caution" on roads and dirt tracks to avoid getting trapped by these IED blasts . The attacks have risen by around 150 per cent while the injuries to troops have gone up by four times in first three months of this year .
summary2: The number of security personnel injured in IED attacks in Chhattisgarh has jumped to around 300 per cent in the first quarter of 2025 . As summer peaks in the jungles of the "last Naxal bastion" of the state, the security agencies are "treading with caution" on roads and dirt tracks to avoid getting trapped by these IED blasts . The attacks have risen by around 150 per cent while the injuries to troops have gone up by four times in first three months of this year . The entire year of 2024 saw 43 cases of IED . which led to recovery of 292 IEDs and injuries to 33 personnel including nine from the CRPF, the lead anti-Maoist operations force across the Left Wing Extremism affected states . The security forces have been asked to scrupulously follow the old drill of walking the stretch rather boarding vehicles during operations and avoid taking the beaten track, he said . Even civilians have not been spared, he added .

title: Beijing moves to soothe India over $100 billion trade deficit
summary1: China has informally sent feelers about addressing India’s concerns on the trade deficit though higher imports of Indian goods by removing tariff and non-tariff barriers . The move comes at a time when China is grappling with US tariffs of 145% on all Chinese goods . India hasn’t taken any formal position on the matter as yet because such bilateral talks involve the principle of reciprocity . New Delhi fears that easing trade barriers bilaterally could further aggravate the dumping of Chinese goods in India .
summary2: China has informally sent feelers about addressing India’s concerns on the trade deficit though higher imports of Indian goods by removing tariff and non-tariff barriers . The move comes at a time when China is grappling with US tariffs of 145% on all Chinese goods . India hasn’t taken any formal position on the matter as yet because such bilateral talks involve the principle of reciprocity . New Delhi fears that easing trade barriers bilaterally could further aggravate the dumping of Chinese goods in India, thee people added . China's ambassador Xu Feihong recently spoke of the possibility of China buying more Indian goods and attracting investments from Indian firms . India's trade deficit with China was $73.31 billion in 2021-22, $83.2 billion in 2022-23 and $85.08 billion in 2023-24, according to the DGCIS . The Indian side has flagged two major issues to China – the huge deficit and the lack of predictable trade arrangements, people said .

title: India, US may strike deal on medical devices for generics
summary1: The US has raised specific tariff and non-tariff issues related to exports of its pharmaceutical products and medical devices in the Indian market . India exported drugs and pharmaceuticals worth $27.85 billion in FY24 with 9.7% year-on-year growth . The US is its largest market with little over 30% share in the sectoral export pie . While the US levies zero duty on most pharmaceuticals, American drugs attract 0-10% tariff in India . The first tranche of the BTA is expected to be finalised by the second quarter of FY25 .
summary2: The US has raised specific tariff and non-tariff issues related to exports of its pharmaceutical products and medical devices in the Indian market . While the US levies zero duty on most pharmaceuticals, American drugs attract 0-10% tariff in India . India exported drugs and pharmaceuticals worth $27.85 billion in FY24 with 9.7% year-on-year growth . The US is its largest market with little over 30% share in the sectoral export pie . The first tranche of the BTA is expected to be finalised by the second quarter of FY25 . For the first time in any trade agreement, a separate annexure on pharmaceuticals has been incorporated to facilitate access of Indian pharmaceutical products, especially automatic registration and marketing authorisation in 90 days for products approved by developed country regulators namely the United States (USFDA, the UKMHRA, the European Union, and Japan (PMDA), the UKEMA). title: Maharashtra: 40-year-old man dies of Guillain-Barre Syndrome in Solapur
summary1: A 40-year-old man in Maharashtra's Solapur died due to Guillain-Barre Syndrome, state health minister Prakash Abitkar said . It is the first death in the state due to the immunological nerve disorder . GBS causes acute numbness and muscle weakness, which can progress to significant weakness in the limbs, along with diarrhea and other symptoms . Experts suspect the disease may have been triggered by contaminated water . The Rapid Response Team (RRT) has continued monitoring the affected areas along Sinhgad Road .
summary2: A 40-year-old man in Maharashtra's Solapur died due to Guillain-Barre Syndrome, state health minister Prakash Abitkar said . It is the first death in the state due to the immunological nerve disorder . GBS causes acute numbness and muscle weakness, which can progress to significant weakness in the limbs, along with diarrhea and other symptoms . Experts suspect the disease may have been triggered by contaminated water . The Rapid Response Team (RRT) has been formed to investigate the sudden rise in cases, which followed the initial identification of 24 suspected cases . The RRT has continued monitoring the affected areas along Sinhgad Road, including 25,578 houses have been surveyed, including 15,761 under the Pune Municipal Corporation limits, 3,719 in the Chinchwad Municipal Corporation, and 6,098 in the district's rural areas, as reported by an official . Pune municipal corporation has set up a 45-bed facility

title: How soon can Liverpool win Premier League 2024-25? All scenarios explained
summary1: Liverpool are likely to win the Premier League for the second time in their history . The 2019-20 champions are currently 13 points clear of second-placed Arsenal . If Liverpool win their next three matches, the title will be theirs at Anfield . If Arsenal lose against Ipswich Town and Liverpool win two games out of three, the Reds will win the title . title: Telangana HC halts work on 400-acre land parcel till Apr 3
summary1: Telangana High Court orders state government to suspend work on 400-acre land parcel adjacent to University of Hyderabad . Petitioners were seeking a directive from the court to stop the uprooting of trees and land clearing at the Kancha Gachibowli site . The petitioners also challenged the state government's decision to allot the land to the TGIIC, claiming it violated the Forest Conservation Act . The court posted the matter for further hearing on April 3, and ordered work to be suspended until April 3 .
summary2: Telangana High Court orders state government to suspend work on 400-acre land parcel adjacent to University of Hyderabad . Petitioners were seeking a directive from the court to stop the uprooting of trees and land clearing at the Kancha Gachibowli site . The petitioners also challenged the state government's decision to allot the land to the TGIIC, claiming it violated the Forest Conservation Act . The court posted the matter for further hearing on April 3, and ordered the work to be suspended until April 3 . Meanwhile, student groups from UoH continue to protest against the government's plans to develop IT infrastructure and other projects on the site, which has become a bone of contention, for a day . The TGI ICIC stated that it had established its ownership of the land in court and that UOH, a central university, does not own any portion of the disputed land. Meanwhile, the T GIIC said it had already established its own ownership of land

title: Police halt protest rally by UoH students, faculty over land dispute
summary1: Protest rally against Telangana government's plans to develop a 400-acre land parcel in Kancha Gachibowli bordering the University of Hyderabad was stopped by the police . Police barricaded the entire East Campus area while heavy machinery was deployed to clear the site . Students and faculty led a rally from Ambedkar auditorium to East Campus in solidarity with the agitating students . The government maintains that the land parcel belonged to it and not the varsity . The student groups and environmental activists have voiced opposition to the proposal to undertake development work .
summary2: Protest rally against Telangana government's plans to develop a 400-acre land parcel in Kancha Gachibowli bordering the University of Hyderabad was stopped by the police . Police barricaded the entire East Campus area while heavy machinery was deployed to clear the site . Students and faculty led a rally from Ambedkar auditorium to East Campus in solidarity with the agitating students . The government maintains that the land parcel belonged to it and not the varsity . The student groups and environmental activists have voiced opposition to the proposal to undertake development work at the site, citing environmental conservation concerns . The university's Students’ Union and other unions and parties aligned with it have launched an indefinite protest and announced boycott of classes from April 1, demanding the removal of police personnel and earth-moving machinery from the campus . summary1: CCTV footage shows the man cornering two women and groping one of them in Bengaluru’s BTM Layout on April 3 . The incident occurred in the early hours of April 3, when two women walking through a narrow alley were approached by Santosh . The footage, which went viral, shows the women visibly distressed as they walk away . Santosh has allegedly told the police that he was drunk at the time of the incident and that he fled to Hosur in Tamil Nadu to stay with a friend when the video surfaced on social media .

title: Mohamed Salah not going anywhere, signs contract extension with Liverpool
summary1: Mohamed Salah has signed a contract extension with Liverpool until 2024-25 season . The Egyptian has scored 32 goals in 45 appearances in all competitions this season . Salah is the club's third-highest goalscorer of all time . The 32-year-old has helped Liverpool to Champions League and Premier League titles . He has been named Player of the Year two times by his fellow professionals and football writers . Liverpool are the hot favourites to win the Premier League in 2024-24 season .
summary2: Mohamed Salah has signed a contract extension with Liverpool until 2024-25 season . The Egyptian has scored 32 goals in 45 appearances in all competitions this season . Salah is the club's third-highest goalscorer of all time . The 32-year-old has helped Liverpool to Champions League and Premier League titles . He has been named Player of the Year two times by his fellow professionals and football writers . Liverpool are the hot favourites to win the Premier League in the 2024/25 season, with Salah's new deal keeping him at Anfield beyond the next 10 years of his Anfield career . He is currently joint-fifth in the all-time Premier League goalscoring charts with 184 goals to his name . Liverpool have also won the FA Cup, two League Cups, the Club World Cup, and the UEFA Super Cup in the last five years of the last four seasons of his stay at Anfield . title: The Trump family is now going all-in on crypto projects | Full details here
summary1: President Donald Trump and his family have taken a interest in just about every corner of the crypto industry . There are nonfungible tokens and digital collectibles; a decentralized finance project; a proposed stablecoin; an effort at Bitcoin mining; and a pair of memecoins, one for the president and one for First Lady Melania Trump . Trump is already the richest person to have ever become US president, and his non-crypto holdings include significant investments in real estate . The president’s own public conversion to crypto is still relatively new .
summary2: President Donald Trump and his family have taken a interest in just about every corner of the crypto industry . There are nonfungible tokens and digital collectibles; a decentralized finance project; a proposed stablecoin; an effort at Bitcoin mining; and a pair of memecoins, one for the president and one for First Lady Melania Trump . Trump is already the richest person to have ever become US president, and his non-crypto holdings include significant investments in real estate . The president’s own public conversion to crypto is still relatively new . Trump called Bitcoin a “scam” as recently as 2021, telling Fox Business at the time that he didn’t like the token “because it’�s another currency competing against the dollar” and that it should be regulated “very, very high” The president last year hosted dinners for fans who purchased his NFTs, which have brought in millions of dollars, according to financial disclosures .

title: Thane court acquits man in 2018 sexual assault case due to weak prosecution
summary1: A court in Maharashtra's Thane district has acquitted a man accused of sexually assaulting a 15-year-old boy in 2018 . The court reprimanded the prosecution for a "half-hearted" investigation . The judge highlighted several inconsistencies and gaps in the prosecution's case . The accused was booked under various legal provisions, including the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act . The victim claimed the accused offered him a ride home, but took him to a secluded area, consumed liquor and sexually assaulted him .
summary2: A court in Maharashtra's Thane district has acquitted a man accused of sexually assaulting a 15-year-old boy in 2018 . The court reprimanded the prosecution for a "half-hearted" investigation . The judge highlighted several inconsistencies and gaps in the prosecution's case . The accused was booked under various legal provisions, including the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act . The victim claimed the accused offered him a ride back home, but took him to a secluded area, consumed liquor and sexually assaulted him . The doctor who examined the victim did not find any injury, abrasion or change in colour near the private parts of the victim, the court said . The medical witness admitted the injury could have occurred due to other reasons, and the surgeon's report lacked crucial details, such as when the injury happened, it said. The court also pointed out the prosecution failed to examine two crucial witnesses, the judge said. "The saga of half-hearted investigation doesn't end here

title: How Meerut man's Umrah trip turned into a Jihad nightmare
summary1: Ali Murtaza, a Meerut resident, claimed he was held hostage by a terror recruitment ring . Police are investigating the alleged plot to recruit him for Jihad in Syria . Local travel agent who facilitated his trip to Mecca has been arrested . Authorities are now tracing the broader network behind the operation, which is said to be operating from Saudi Arabia . Police have confirmed that an investigation is underway based on the allegations made in the video and the formal complaint made by the victim of the ring is underway . The victim has now returned to India safely after recovering his passport, police said .
summary2: Ali Murtaza, a Meerut resident, claimed he was held hostage by a terror recruitment ring . Police are investigating the alleged plot to recruit him for Jihad in Syria . Local travel agent who facilitated his trip to Mecca has been arrested . Authorities are now tracing the broader network behind the operation, which is said to be operating from Saudi Arabia . Police have confirmed that an investigation is underway based on the allegations made in the video and the formal complaint made by the victim of the ring is underway . The victim has now returned to India safely after recovering his passport and returning to his native city of Uttar Pradesh, where he was due to attend a pilgrimage to Mecca on March 26, according to the police report . The case has sent shockwaves through his hometown and sparked national concern . He made a direct appeal to the Prime Minister Narendra Modi and the Ministry of External Affairs for urgent assistance to his wife Rukhsar, the report said . title: Canadians Are Cashing Out Their American Vacation Homes
summary1: Many Canadians are giving up their U.S. vacation homes, selling properties they have owned for decades in popular snowbird spots like Florida and Arizona . The president’s repeated references to Canada asthe 51st state were the last straw, says Nathalie Mancuso, a Canadian elementary school teacher, who sold her Florida condo for $235,000 in March . Agents say their clients talk about feeling increasingly unwelcome and worry that the government may increase taxes on properties owned by Canadians . A 25% importtariffon goods from Canada took effect in March, with an exception for energy products and potashashash .
summary2: Many Canadians are giving up their U.S. vacation homes, selling properties they have owned for decades in popular snowbird spots like Florida and Arizona . Agents say their clients talk about feeling increasingly unwelcome and worry that the government may increase taxes on properties owned by Canadians . A 25% importtariffon goods from Canada took effect in March, with an exception for energy products and potashashash . The tariffs have pushed Canada to the recession of two years, says Garry Liboiron, a 76-year-old Canadian who bought the vacation house for around $155,000 in 2011 and spent much of the winter there over the years, but he had no plans to leave until the tariffs, which sped up his decision to sell by two years

title: Chhattisgarh: Injuries to troops in anti-Naxal ops jump 4 times in 2025
summary1: The number of security personnel injured in IED attacks in Chhattisgarh has jumped to around 300 per cent in the first quarter of 2025 . As summer peaks in the jungles of the "last Naxal bastion" of the state, the security agencies are "treading with caution" on roads and dirt tracks to avoid getting trapped by these IED blasts . The attacks have risen by around 150 per cent while the injuries to troops have gone up by four times in first three months of this year .
summary2: The number of security personnel injured in IED attacks in Chhattisgarh has jumped to around 300 per cent in the first quarter of 2025 . As summer peaks in the jungles of the "last Naxal bastion" of the state, the security agencies are "treading with caution" on roads and dirt tracks to avoid getting trapped by these IED blasts . The attacks have risen by around 150 per cent while the injuries to troops have gone up by four times in first three months of this year . The entire year of 2024 saw 43 cases of IED . which led to recovery of 292 IEDs and injuries to 33 personnel including nine from the CRPF, the lead anti-Maoist operations force across the Left Wing Extremism affected states . The security forces have been asked to scrupulously follow the old drill of walking the stretch rather boarding vehicles during operations and avoid taking the beaten track, he said . Even civilians have not been spared, he added .

title: Maharashtra reports 207 GBS cases, death toll remains at 8
summary1: The tally of suspected and confirmed Gullain-Barre Syndrome cases in Maharashtra has reached 207 . With the addition of two new cases on Friday, the tally of confirmed cases stands at 180, of which 20 are on ventilator support . The official death toll remained unchanged at eight as per the state health department . GBS is a rare condition in which a person's immune system attacks the peripheral nerves, resulting in muscle weakness, loss of sensation in the legs and/or arms .
summary2: The tally of suspected and confirmed Gullain-Barre Syndrome cases in Maharashtra has reached 207 . With the addition of two new cases on Friday, the tally of confirmed cases stands at 180, of which 20 are on ventilator support . The official death toll remained unchanged at eight as per the state health department . GBS is a rare condition in which a person's immune system attacks the peripheral nerves, resulting in muscle weakness, loss of sensation in the legs and/or arms, and problems swallowing or breathing . A 60-year-old woman from Changid tehsil there died on February 13, a district health official said . She suffered paralysis of the lower limbs and was first admitted in ahospitalin Changid and then taken to neighbouring Karnataka. She was brought back to a hospital in Kolhapur on February 11, where she died two days later, the official said. title: Telangana tunnel accident: Search ops to be over in 15 days, says Minister Srinivas Reddy
summary1: Telangana Revenue Minister P Srinivas Reddy on Wednesday said the ongoing search operations at SLBC tunnel are expected to be completed in 15 days . Eight individuals were trapped in the Srisailam Left Bank Canal project tunnel when a portion of it collapsed on February 22 . Reddy said about 700-800 experts from various institutions have worked day and night under the supervision of the authorities for the 40 days . The services of cadaver dogs from Kerala are being used to find out the traces of those trapped .
summary2: Telangana Revenue Minister P Srinivas Reddy on Wednesday said the ongoing search operations at SLBC tunnel are expected to be completed in 15 days . Eight individuals were trapped in the Srisailam Left Bank Canal project tunnel when a portion of it collapsed on February 22 . Reddy said about 700-800 experts from various institutions have worked day and night under the supervision of the authorities for the 40 days and currently, around 550-560 people are continuing the search operations . So far, two bodies have been recovered from the debris in the tunnel . The services of cadaver dogs from Kerala are being used to find out the traces of those trapped in tunnel accident . The minister said all necessary steps would be taken to prevent any losses during tunnel excavation in the future . The state government has made arrangements so that those involved in relief operations do not face any problems. The state has made an arrangement so that these involved in the relief operations are not facing any problems, he further said .

title: Are stock markets open on Monday, April 14? Details here
summary1: The stock market in India will remain closed tomorrow, April 14, on account of Ambedkar Jayanti . No trading activity will occur on the BSE or NSE on Monday . The market will resume on April 15, April 15 and April 18, on the occasion of Good Friday . The Indian stock market is scheduled to observe a total of 14 holidays in 2025 . President Barack Obama's tariffs on the U.K. State Department's decision to impose new restrictions on some of the world's biggest oil and gas prices in recent days .

title: Gold prices ease from record high after Donald Trump's tariff exemptions
summary1: Spot gold was down by 0.1 per cent hitting $3,232.45 an ounce on Monday, April 14, after hitting a record high earlier . US President Donald Trump exempted smartphones and computers from the reciprocal tariffs on China on Sunday . As a result, gold prices on Friday vaulted over the $2,200-per-ounce mark for the first time . Non-yielding gold has traditionally been viewed as a hedge against economic uncertainty and inflation . Gold traders forecast around 80 basis points worth of interest rate cuts globally by the end of 2025 .
summary2: Spot gold was down by 0.1 per cent hitting $3,232.45 an ounce on Monday, April 14, after hitting a record high earlier . US President Donald Trump exempted smartphones and computers from the reciprocal tariffs on China on Sunday . As a result, gold prices on Friday vaulted over the $2,200-per-ounce mark for the first time . Non-yielding gold has traditionally been viewed as a hedge against economic uncertainty and inflation . Gold traders forecast around 80 basis points worth of interest rate cuts globally by the end of 2025, as per a report by news agency Reuters quoted KCM Trade chief market analyst Tim Waterer as having said . Gold usually tends to thrive in a low-interest-rate environment. Goldman Sachs even raised its end-2025 gold price forecast to $ 3,700 per ounce from $3-300, citing stronger-than-expected central bank demand and boosted ETF inflows, according to the report . title: India, China in early talks to resume direct flights: Aviation secretary
summary1: Direct flights between the two countries were halted following the outbreak of the Covid-19 pandemic and the border clashes in 2020 . The talks are at a preliminary stage and no specific dates have been set for the resumption of flights . Indian civil aviation secretary Vumlunmang Vualnam said that some issues remain unresolved, and further discussions are expected . He said that India has a deregulated market, which complicates control over fare fluctuations, especially during peak seasons . 16 airlines have ceased operations in India, and only five remain .
summary2: Direct flights between the two countries were halted following the outbreak of the Covid-19 pandemic and the border clashes in 2020 . The talks are at a preliminary stage and no specific dates have been set for the resumption of flights . Indian civil aviation secretary Vumlunmang Vualnam said that some issues remain unresolved, and further discussions are expected . He said that India has a deregulated market, which complicates control over fare fluctuations, especially during peak seasons . 16 airlines have ceased operations in India, and only five remain, according to the Indian Chamber of Commerce (ICC) Vualam said there is no simple solution due to the de regulated market, but coordination is ongoing with the civil aviation ministry and DGCA to address concerns . The AirSewa portal and its mobile app will now give more prominence to airfares in India. title: When a German torpedo sank Ambedkar's PhD thesis
summary1: In 1917, BR Ambedkar was forced to return to India after his Baroda scholarship expired and the state refused to extend his financial support . On July 20, a German submarine, UB-40, fired a torpedo at the SS Salsette, killing 15 crew members and sinking the ship . The torpedo sank the SS Salcette, along with a draft of his PhD dissertation and a vast collection of books . The incident is part of the folklore featuring the herculean academic efforts of Ambedkkar .
summary2: In 1917, BR Ambedkar was forced to return to India after his Baroda scholarship expired and the state refused to extend his financial support . On July 20, a German submarine, UB-40, fired a torpedo at the SS Salsette, killing 15 crew members and sinking the ship . The torpedo sank the SS Salcette, along with a draft of his PhD dissertation and a vast collection of books . The incident is part of the folklore featuring the herculean academic efforts of Ambedkkar, who went on to win at least two doctorates, and several other honorary ones . On Monday, across the country, tributes were paid to the main architect of the Indian Constitution on his 135th anniversary of the death of his birth in India . The book 'Becoming Babasaheb: The Life and Times of Bhimrao Ramji ambedkar is published by Aakash Singh Rathore, published by HarperCollins India, is out now .

title: Pratt & Whitney names Ashish Saraf as vice president and India head
summary1: Pratt & Whitney appoints Ashish Saraf as Vice President and Country Head, India . Saraf will lead all strategic growth and transformation efforts in India, company says . He joins from Thales, where he served as the country director and chairman for all Thales India businesses, including aerospace, defence, biometrics, cybersecurity, and the Global Capability Center . He has over 20 years of industry and consulting experience, with an extensive background spanning the aerospace, space, defence and manufacturing sectors .
summary2: Pratt & Whitney appoints Ashish Saraf as Vice President and Country Head, India . Saraf will lead all strategic growth and transformation efforts in India, company says . He joins from Thales, where he served as the country director and chairman for all Thales India businesses, including aerospace, defence, biometrics, cybersecurity, and the Global Capability Center . He has over 20 years of industry and consulting experience, with an extensive background spanning the aerospace, space, defence and manufacturing sectors, Pratt &Whitney said . He will be responsible for the growth and alignment of the in-country engineering, supply chain, customer service, operations, and digital transformation centres, the company said . The company has invested more than USD 40 million in the past four years in expanding its engineering, digital transformation, supply chains and aftermarket presence in India in the last four years, said Satheeshkumar Kumarasingam, chief digital officer, Pratt and Whitney . title: Mysuru royal family member asks villagers not to panic after her claim over 4,500 acres of land
summary1: Pramoda Devi Wadiyar of the erstwhile Mysuru royal family said over 4,500 acres of land in Siddayyanapura belonged to the royal family as per the agreement between the Maharaja of Mysore and the Government of India in February 1951 . She said she would not take any steps even if the land she has staked claim is found in the name of the family . The assurance came after the state government moved ahead to declare the village as a revenue village . The villagers made a beeline before the Deputy Commissioner to resolve the issue .

The villagers made a beeline before the Deputy Commissioner to resolve the issue and even claimed that the Mysur Maharaja had gifted them land as gift . “We don’t know why the villagers are in fear. title: Amid trade war, Tim Cook clarifies why Apple manufactures in China in old video
summary1: A resurfaced video of Apple CEO Tim Cook has shed new light on why the tech giant remains committed to the country’s production network . The video, which has been circulating on social media, features Cook countering a popular belief that companies manufacture in China due to cheap labour . He explains that the real advantage lies in China's vast and deeply developed industrial ecosystem . Cook: "If you look at the U.S., you could have a meeting of tooling engineers and I’m not sure we could fill a room in China, you could fill multiple football fields"
summary2: A resurfaced video of Apple CEO Tim Cook has shed new light on why the tech giant remains committed to the country’s production network . The video, which has been circulating on social media, features Cook countering a popular belief that companies manufacture in China due to cheap labour . He explains that the real advantage lies in China's vast and deeply developed industrial ecosystem . Cook: "If you look at the U.S., you could have a meeting of tooling engineers and I’m not sure we could fill a room in China, you could fill multiple football fields" The video has prompted a wave of online reactions, with many users supporting Cook's viewpoint, with one saying, "Any manufacturing job requires tremendous discipline. It's not just labour; it's a full ecosystem built over decades, with deep supply chains and rapid turnaround that's hard to replicate elsewhere,” one user said. The video resurfaced during heightened tensions between the United States and China over trade tensions .

title: Apple was on brink of a major crisis before tariff concession from Trump
summary1: Donald Trump's 125% tariffs on goods produced in China threatened to upend Apple's supply chain . Before the latest exemption, the iPhone maker had a plan to adjust its supply chain to make more US-bound iPhones in India, which would have been subject to far lower levies . Apple generates about 17% of its revenue from the country and operates dozens of stores, making it an outlier among US-based companies . The iPhone is Apple’s biggest moneymaker, and about 87% of them are made in China .
summary2: Donald Trump's 125% tariffs on goods produced in China threatened to upend Apple's supply chain . Before the latest exemption, the iPhone maker had a plan to adjust its supply chain to make more US-bound iPhones in India, which would have been subject to far lower levies . Apple generates about 17% of its revenue from the country and operates dozens of stores, making it an outlier among US-based companies . The iPhone is Apple’s biggest moneymaker, and about 87% of them are made in China, according to estimates from Morgan Stanley . The company generates about 38% of iPad sales in the US, as well as about half its Mac, Mac, Apple Watch and AirPods revenue, Morgan Stanley estimates . But the feeling of uncertainty remains, and Apple may need to pursue more dramatic changes to the White House policies are likely to shift again, though, at least for now, though for now. At least for the moment, however, management is breathing a relief .

title: Are banks open on April 14, Ambedkar Jayanti 2025? Full bank holiday list
summary1: D BR Ambedkar Jayanti is a national holiday held on April 14 every year to commemorate the birth anniversary of the chief architect of the Indian Constitution . Banks will be closed in Gujarat, Mizoram, Maharashtra, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, West Bengal, New Delhi, Chhattisgarh, and Jharkhand . It is among the several other bank holidays scheduled in April 2025, including Good Friday, Bohag Bihu, Basava Jayanti and Akshaya Tritiya .
summary2: D BR Ambedkar Jayanti is a national holiday held on April 14 every year to commemorate the birth anniversary of the chief architect of the Indian Constitution . This means that banks will be closed in Gujarat, Mizoram, Maharashtra, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, West Bengal, New Delhi, Chhattisgarh, and Jharkhand . It is among the several other bank holidays scheduled in April 2025, including Good Friday, Bohag Bihu, Basava Jayanti, and Akshaya Tritiya . Customers can still access digital or net banking services throughout the year, unless the bank notifies otherwise (Usually for maintenance work) It is, however, best advised to contact your nearest bank branch in case there are any further confusions regarding bank holidays . You can even start a fixed deposit or a recurring deposit on such days digitally on these days digitally and to use your bank website, banking apps, UPI and ATM services

title: "Still a very good wicket": Cummins reacts as LSG defeat SRH by five wickets
summary1: Lucknow Super Giants beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by five wickets in their IPL clash . LSG chased down Sunriser Hyderabad's total of 190 in their run-chase . Nicholas Pooran and Mitchell Marsh scored half-centuries for LSG . Shardul Thakur was named the 'Player of the Match' for his fiery spell . Captain Pat Cummins praised LSG's bowlers for their well-planned approach to chase down SRH's total . With this win, LSG strengthened their position in the tournament .
summary2: Lucknow Super Giants beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by five wickets in their IPL clash . LSG chased down Sunriser Hyderabad's total of 190 in their run-chase . Nicholas Pooran and Mitchell Marsh scored half-centuries for LSG . Shardul Thakur was named the 'Player of the Match' for his fiery spell . Captain Pat Cummins praised LSG's bowlers for their well-planned approach to chase down SRH's total . With this win, LSG strengthened their position in the IPL while SRH will look to bounce back in their upcoming matches as IPL season progresses to the next two weeks of the season . The IPL is currently playing in a nine-match series with IPL teams in Hyderabad and Mumbai Indians at the helm of the IPLA . title: Police impose entry restrictions in 400-acre Kancha Gachibowli area over UoH land row
summary1: Cyberabad Police imposed restrictions until April 16 on entry of people into a 400-acre land parcel in Kancha Gachibowli, adjacent to the University of Hyderabad . The Telangana government’s plan to auction this ecologically sensitive land for the construction of urban infrastructure and an IT Park has triggered protests by the UoH Students’ Union . The matter is currently being heard in both the High Court and the Supreme Court . The Supreme Court has stayed any further activity until further orders . The order aims to prevent danger to human life and safety, maintain public tranquility .
summary2: Cyberabad Police imposed restrictions until April 16 on entry of people into a 400-acre land parcel in Kancha Gachibowli, adjacent to the University of Hyderabad . The Telangana government’s plan to auction this ecologically sensitive land for the construction of urban infrastructure and an IT Park has triggered protests by the UoH Students’ Union . The matter is currently being heard in both the High Court and the Supreme Court . The Supreme Court has stayed any further activity until further orders . The order aims to prevent danger to human life and safety, maintain public tranquility, and avert the possibility of riots, affray, or obstruction to any person lawfully discharging their duties, police said . Following the incident, 53 individuals were taken into preventive custody and later released on personal bonds. Police also said that two individuals were arrested and clarified that they are no longer students of the university were no longer university students . title: Alesi betting on Verstappen to clinch 2025 crown
summary1: Jean Alesi says Max Verstappen can win the drivers' championship despite not having the fastest car on the grid . The Red Bull driver is second in the standings, only one point behind McLaren's Lando Norris . Alesi expects Ferrari and Mercedes as well as Mercedes to close in as the championship progresses . The Frenchman raced in 202 GPs from 1989 to 2001 and earned 32 podiums in his 13 seasons in F1 . He says it is too early to put his money on the Dutchman to win the title .
summary2: Jean Alesi says Max Verstappen can win the drivers' championship despite not having the fastest car on the grid . The Red Bull driver is second in the standings, only one point behind McLaren's Lando Norris . Alesi expects Ferrari and Mercedes as well as Mercedes to close in as the championship progresses . The Frenchman raced in 202 GPs from 1989 to 2001 and earned 32 podiums in his 13 seasons in F1 . He says it is too early to put his money on the Dutchman to win the title this year despite the fact that he has no chance to overtake Norris and Piastri at Suzuka last weekend . The former world champion says the championship is going to be very tight because Mercedes and Ferrari will fight for winning GPs and that will help Max to get the lead of the championship . title: Canadians Are Cashing Out Their American Vacation Homes
summary1: Many Canadians are giving up their U.S. vacation homes, selling properties they have owned for decades in popular snowbird spots like Florida and Arizona . The president’s repeated references to Canada asthe 51st state were the last straw, says Nathalie Mancuso, a Canadian elementary school teacher, who sold her Florida condo for $235,000 in March . Agents say their clients talk about feeling increasingly unwelcome and worry that the government may increase taxes on properties owned by Canadians . A 25% importtariffon goods from Canada took effect in March, with an exception for energy products and potashashash .
summary2: Many Canadians are giving up their U.S. vacation homes, selling properties they have owned for decades in popular snowbird spots like Florida and Arizona . The president’s repeated references to Canada asthe 51st state were the last straw, says Nathalie Mancuso, a Canadian elementary school teacher, who sold her Florida vacation home in March for $235,000 . Agents say their clients talk about feeling increasingly unwelcome and worry that the government may increase taxes on properties owned by Canadians . A 25% importtariffon goods from Canada took effect in March, with an exception for energy products and potashashash . The tariffs have pushed Canada to the recession of two years, says Garry Liboiron, a 76-year-old Canadian who bought the vacation house for around $155,000 in 2011 and spent much of the winter there over the years, but he had no plans to leave until the tariffs, which sped up his decision to sell by two years

title: UoH students detained for protesting against land development plan, released
summary1: The University of Hyderabad Students’ Union (UoHSU) condemned the police action and detention of the protesting students . The Telangana government plans to develop the land and set up an IT park there . A total of 53 students were taken into preventive custody and later they were released . The opposition BRS criticised the ruling Congress over police action, invoking Rahul Gandhi's "Mohabbat ki Dukaan" slogan . The BRS leaders demanded the release of the detained students .
summary2: The University of Hyderabad Students’ Union (UoHSU) condemned the police action and detention of the protesting students . The Telangana government plans to develop the land and set up an IT park there . A total of 53 students were taken into preventive custody and later released, a police official said . The opposition BRS criticised the ruling Congress over police action, invoking Rahul Gandhi's "Mohabbat ki Dukaan" slogan . The BRS leaders demanded the release of the detained students, including MLC-elect Sravan Dasoju, who are lodged at the Madhapur police station where detained students are lodged . A UoH official stated that the land has been owned by the state government since 1974 and was never transferred to the university since 1974 . The land is located in the Financial District of the city's IT parks, but students insist the land includes the Rock Rock area near the university's East Campus near Uo Harsi Rock area .
